profile:
Devlin Drywall Contractors is a ceiling and renovations specialist serving Langley through to Chilliwack for 16 years plus. We provide distinctive quality on all your small to large drywall or acoustical projects (residential and commercial ceilings). We also specialize in drywall renovations, new construction, popcorn removal, texture blending, soundproofing, and T-bar ceilings. 
---
We service all of the Fraser Valley including but not limited to Langley, Abbotsford, Mission, and Chilliwack. 
---
Contact us for a free quote today, or
some friendly advice. We love to help,
and truly care about what we do!
604-309-8317
alex@devlindrywall.ca
---
                 Or come visit us at;
https://www.facebook.com/officialdevlindrywall
https://www.instagram.com/devlindrywall/
products: Trim-Tex Beads, Donn Products and Armstrong Products
services: Drywall Renovations of all kinds, and T-bar ceilings.
specialities: Popcorn Removal, Texture Blending, Drywall Renovations, New Construction and T-Bar.

profile:
Over 35 years of experience in Drywall finishing for residential , commercial and renovations . We also offer steel stud framing , tee bar suspended ceilings and painting. All jobs large or small are completed with high end finishing and service . With being member of the Better Business Bureau of BC , we guarantee all our work for our customers. 
 
Call or text us for a free quote today at 6042404003! Feel free to visit our website for more information.
 
Check out our Facebook !  https://www.facebook.com/universal5stardrywallsystems/
